text: Cobra is a 1986 action movie. It was directed by George P. Cosmatos. The movie is based on the 1978 novel Fair Game by Paula Gosling. It was remade in 1995 as Fair Game. Cobra stars Sylvester Stallone, Brigitte Nielsen, Reni Santoni, Brian Thompson, and John Herzfeld. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1986 action movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by George P. Cosmatos
title: Cobra (1986 movie)
